page.title: 16Totternhoe Cub Pack
page.content: Akela is the leader of the pack and Bagheera is second in command. The cubs and scouts meet once a week in the scout hut by the Knolls. There are lots of games to play and badges to be worked for. The badges include, sportsman, home-help,swimming, artist, reading, athlete, camper, collector, communicator, cook, cyclist, entertainer, explorer, first-aider, fisherman, gardener, home help, hobbies, map-reader, musician, photographer, scientist and conservationist. There are also the bronze, silver and gold arrows as well as the Link Badge which leads on to Scouts. Cubs are grouped in four teams, red, green, yellow and blue. There are at present twenty nine cubs and thirty nine scouts. The cubs uniform is mostly green. It includes a neckerchief, a cap and a woggle.
